review: We visited aware global hospital lb nagar.  The dr appointment time is nearly one hr. Dr is good n friendly. But the staff n lab incharge are very anxious n rude behaviour. They make us to wait for 3-4 hrs for only one Treadmill test which takes 10 mins time. They neither refunded my amount nor make the test.We suffered a lot with small kid of 3 years. Better to avoid diagnostic tests in aware global hospital.

We had consulted the doctor for my brother as he had stomach pain and loose motion problem. Doctor was nice. We are satisfied with the treatment given. I would recommend this doctor to my family and friends.
